channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- AutomatorWP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- AutomatorWP

item.title: CVE-2021-24717|2024-08-03T19:42:16.585Z -- unknown -- automatorwp
item.description: The AutomatorWP WordPress plugin before 1.7.6 does not perform capability checks which allows users with Subscriber roles to enumerate automations, disclose title of private posts or user emails, call functions, or perform privilege escalation via Ajax actions.
